GSP33brsgor3u:280: avaroha eva tṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ śrutyuktamityata āha-avarohasyeti /

GSP33brsgor3u:311: udakaṃ bhittvā jāyate yūkādi jaṅgamamiti bhedaḥ /

GSP33brsgor3u:319: nivṛttāścānuśayinaḥ karmānte drutadehā ākāśaṃ gatā ākāśasadṛśā bhavanti /
GSP33brsgor3u:320: ākāśasādṛśyānantaraṃ piṇḍīkṛtā atisūkṣmaliṅgopahitāḥ vāyunetastataśca nīyamānā vāyusamā bhavanti /
GSP33brsgor3u:321: so 'nuśayī saṃgho vāyusamo bhūtvā dhūmasaṃgatastatsamo bhavati, dhūmasamo bhūtvābhrasamo bhavati /
GSP33brsgor3u:323: mehati siñcatīti vṛṣṭikartā meghastatsamo bhūtvā varṣadhārādvārā pṛthivīṃ praviśya vrīhiyavādirūpo bhavatīti siddhāntagatyā śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:325_1: tu dugdhaṃ dadhi bhavatītyādiprayoge bhavatiśrutervikārasvarūpāpattau mukhyatvāt
GSP33brsgor3u:328: samāno bhāvo dharmo yasya tadbhāvaḥ sābhāvyaṃ sāmyamiti sūtrapadārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:340: uktaṃ sādṛśyamupajīvya loke gantṛṇāṃ cirāciragatidarśanātsaṃśayaṃ vadan pūrvapakṣayati-tatretyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:342: siddhānte tu vrīhīyavādibhāvādanuśayināṃ vilambena nirgamanamiti viśeṣādākāśādibhāvācchīghraṃ nirgama ityavilambena yonyāpattirityanusaṃdhānādvairāgyadārḍhyamiti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:343: nanvākāśādiṣvanuśayināṃ sukhaṃ vrīhiyavādiṣu duḥkhamiti duḥśabdādbhāti na cirāciranirgamanamityata āha-sukhaduḥkhatāviśeṣaścāyamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:351: iha bhūmau varṣadhārādvārā patitāste 'nuśayino vrīhyādisāmyena jāyanta iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:352: atra jāyanta iti śruteḥ pūrvatrākāśādivarṣāntasādṛśyokteśca saṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brsgor3u:357: siddhānte vrīhyādisaṃśleṣamātraṃ parihartuṃ yatnalāghavaṃ vairāgyadārḍhyaṃ ceti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:358: nanu dehotpattyā jīvānāṃ janma syānna svataḥ, vrīhyadestu na dehatvamityata āha-sthāvarabhāvasyeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:363: kratvarthahiṃsāderapi hiṃsātvādisāmānyena pravṛtterna hiṃsyādityādiśāstraniṣiddhatvākāreṇa duritāpūrvakāritvamaviruddhamiti sāṅkhyā āhuḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:364: śruto 'tra vrīhyādibhāvo 'nuśayināṃ na janyarūpaḥ karmaviśeṣaparāmarśaṃ vinātroktatvāt,
GSP33brsgor3u:366: pūrvavaditi padaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvena hetvaṃśatvena ca vyākhyātaṃ yadatra prakaraṇe karmaviśeṣaparāmarśakamucyate tajjanmeti vyatirekadṛṣṭāntamapyāha-yatra tviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:367_0: apica 'yo yo hyannamatti yo retaḥ striyāṃ siñcati tadbhūya eva bhavati'iti vākyaśeṣe
GSP33brsgor3u:376: aśuddham iti cen na śabdāt | BBs_3,1.25 |
GSP33brsgor3u:377: vaidikaṃ karmāśuddhaṃ na bhavati śāstravihitatvāditi sūtrārthaṃ prapañcayati-ayaṃ dharma ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:378_0: śucau deśe prātaḥ sāyaṅkāle jīvanādinimitte kṛtamagnihotraṃ dharmo bhavati sa evāśucideśe
GSP33brsgor3u:378_1: madhyarātre maraṇādinimitte kṛtaḥ sannadharmo bhavatīti nirṇayaḥ śāstraikasādhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:380: nanu yā hiṃsā so 'dharma ityutsargasya viśeṣavidhinā bādho 'tra na yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:383: ayamarthaḥ-kāmye karmaṇi sarvatra karaṇāṃśe rāgataḥ pravṛttiḥ, aṅgeṣu vidhita iti sthitiḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:384: tathāca śyenākhye karmaṇi niṣedhe 'pi rāgaprābalyāt pravṛttiḥ syāt kratvaṅgahiṃsādau tu vidhita eva pravṛttirvācyā /
GSP33brsgor3u:385: sa ca vidhiryadyutsargaprāptamanarthahetutvaṃ na bādheta tarhi pravartako na syāt,
GSP33brsgor3u:390: pratirūpaṃ duḥkharūpaṃ tasya phalaṃ neti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor3u:397: tatrānnasthānuśayino retaḥ sekakartṛtvāyogādyogamātraṃ vācyaṃ tadvadupakrame 'pi yoga evāstheyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:404: evaṃ karmiṇāṃ gatyāgatisaṃsāro durvāra ityanusandhānāt karmaphalādvairāgyaṃ tattvajñānasādhanaṃ siddhamiti pādārthamupasaṃharati-iti siddhamiti //27//
GSP33brsgor3u:406: iti śrīmadparamahaṃsaparivrājakācārya śrīmadgovindabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brsgor3u:414: uktavairāgyasādhyastattvaṃpadārthaviveko vākyārthajñānasādhanamasmin pāde nirūpyata iti pādayorhetusādhyabhāvasaṃgatimāha-atikrānta iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:416: asmin pāde 'na sthānato 'pi'ityataḥ prāguddeśyatvena prathamaṃ jijñāsitatvaṃpadārtho 'vasthādvārā vivicyate,
GSP33brsgor3u:418_0: tatra pūrvaṃ gatyāgaticintayā jāgradavasthā nirūpitā tadanantarabhāvinīṃ svapnāvasthāṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:418_1: śrutyuktāṃ viṣayīkṛtya tatra svapne rathādisṛṣṭyuktestadabhāvokteśca saṃśayaṃ vadan
GSP33brsgor3u:419: svapnarathādayo jāgradrathādivat vyāvahārikasattākā uta śuktirajatavat prātītikā iti saṃśayārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:423: mumūrṣoḥ sarvendriyopasaṃhārādetallokānanubhavo sati vāsanāmātreṇa imaṃ lokaṃ smarataḥ karmabalādhṛdaye manasā paralokasphūrtirūpaḥ svapno bhavati,
GSP33brsgor3u:425: tathāca śrutiḥ-'tasmin saṃdhye sthāne tiṣṭhannete ubhe sthāne paśyati idaṃ ca paralokasthānaṃ ca'iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:426: ayaṃ svapnaḥ kādācitka ityarucyā nityasvapnasya prabodhasaṃprasādasaṃdhibhavatvamuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:428_0: daivacakṣurādyajanyatadvattvaṃ martyalokalakṣaṇaṃ ca svapne 'stīti lakṣaṇato lokadvayasparśitvāt
GSP33brsgor3u:429: na kevalaṃ śrutyā svapnārthānāṃ vyāvahārikasatyatvaṃ kintu sakartṛkatvādapītyāha-sa hi karteti //1//
GSP33brsgor3u:434: kiñca svapnārthāḥ satyāḥ, prājñanirmitatvāt, ākāśādivaditi sūtrārthamāha-apicetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:436: yaḥ supteṣu nirvyāpāreṣu karaṇeṣu jāgarti tadeva śukraṃ svaprakāśaṃ brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:443: svapnarathādayaḥ prātītikā jāgradrathādau kḷptasāmagrīṃ vinā dṛṣṭatvācchuktirūpyādivaditi siddhāntayati-tuśabda ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:444_0: cinmātraniṣṭhāvidyā cittvāvacchedena jīve 'pi sthitā rathādyākārā māyeti sūtrabhāṣyayoruktā
GSP33brsgor3u:444_1: māyāvidyayorabhedajñāpanāya mātrapadena tu sati pramātaryabādhyatvarūpasya vyāvahārikasatyatvasya nirāsa uktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:448: saṃvṛte saṅkīrṇe, paryetuṃ gantuṃ, viparyetumāgantuṃ, śrāvayati prabuddho janaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:451: yatra kāle svapnyayā vṛttyā carati tathā svaśarīre yatheṣṭaṃ caratītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:453: kulāyāddehāt bahirivāmṛta ātmā caritvā yatra kāmaṃ yatheṣṭamīyate viharatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:456: evaṃ sati śrutiyuktibhyāṃ antareva svapne satītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:458: atra rātrisamaye 'pi ketumālādivarṣāntare vāsaro bhavati iti bhārata ityuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:463: sūcakaśca hi śruter ācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ | BBs_3,2.4 |
GSP33brsgor3u:464: svapnasya bhrāntimātratve tatsūcito 'pyarthaḥ satyo na syāditi śaṅkottaratvena sūtrāntaraṃ vyācaṣṭe-māyetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:465: mantreṇa devatānugraheṇauṣadhisevayā vā svapnaḥ satyasūcakāścet satyāḥ syurityata āha-tatrāpi bhavatu nāmeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:467_0: yathā kṛṣidvārā lāṅgalasya gavādijīvananimittatvaṃ tathā svapnabhokturadṛṣṭadvārā
GSP33brsgor3u:467_1: svapnasṛṣṭinimittatvaṃ na tu kumbhaṃ prati kumbhakārasyeva sākṣād svapnakartṛtvaṃ
GSP33brsgor3u:468: tathāca svapnasya sakartṛkatvaṃ mukhyaṃ nāstīti hetvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:475: dvitīyasūtroktaprājñakartṛkatvaheturapi svapnasya kiṃ śrutisiddha uta prājñasya sarveśvaratvāt siddhaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:479: svena bhāsā svīyabuddhivṛttyā svena jyotiṣā svarūpacaitanyena ca svapnamanubhavatītyarthathaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:480: na kevalaṃ bṛhadāraṇyake jīvasya svapnakartṛtvaṃ śrutaṃ kintu kāṭhake 'pītyāha-ihāpīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:482: evaṃ hetoḥ śrutisiddhatvaṃ nirasya dvitīyamaṅgīkaroti-na cāsmābhiriti /
GSP33brsgor3u:483: tarhi hetusiddheḥ svapnasya satyatvamityāśaṅkya satyatvaṃ vyāvahārikaṃ pāramārthikaṃ veti vikalpya vyavahārakāle bādhadarśanāt,
GSP33brsgor3u:486: kastarhi svapnasya jāgrato viśeṣo 'tra kathyata ityāśaṅkya prātibhāsikatvamityāha-prāgiti //4//
GSP33brsgor3u:490: parābhidhyānāt tu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau | BBs_3,2.5 |
GSP33brsgor3u:491: pūrvaṃ kḷptasāmagryabhāvāt svapno māyetyuktamayuktaṃ satyasaṅkalpamātreṇāpi satyasṛṣṭisaṃbhavāditi śaṅkāṃ kṛtvā pariharan sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-athapi syādityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:492: satyasaṃkalpasya hi saṃkalpātsṛṣṭiḥ satyā bhavati jīvasya tvasatyasaṃkalpatvaṃ pratyakṣamiti parihārārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:494: nāstīti na kintvāvṛtamasti tatpunarīśvaraprasādākasyacidvyajyata ityāha-na nāstīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:499_1: vā tṛtīyaṃ viśvaiśvaryamaṇimādirūpaṃ martyadehapāte sati siddhe dehe bhavati tadabhogānantaramātmajñānātkevalo
GSP33brsgor3u:504: uktaiśvaryatirobhāve dehābhimāno heturiti kathanārthaṃ sūtraṃ, tannirasyāṃ śaṅkāmāha-kasmāditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:513: tadabhāvo nāḍīṣu tacchruter ātmani ca | BBs_3,2.7 |
GSP33brsgor3u:516: yatra kāle suptaḥ suṣuptaḥ samasto nirastabāhyakaraṇo manolayātsamyakprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:521: siddhānte nāḍībhiḥ purītataṃ gatvāntarhṛdi brahmaṇyeva śeta iti samuccyāt tannirṇaya iti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:522: ekapuroḍāśārthatvaṃ vrīhiyavayordṛṣṭaṃ nāḍyādīnāmekasmin svāparūpārthe nirapekṣasthānatvaṃ tu kuta ityata āha-nāḍyādīnāṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:524: āyatanaśabdātsaptamyartha ādhāratvaṃ gamyata ityāha-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:525: anyatrāvasthādvaye śrānto jīvo viśrāntisthānaṃ prāṇākhyaṃ sadbrahmopasarpati suṣuptāvityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:526: saptamīśrutyā nirapekṣādhāratvabhānādvikalpa āstheyaḥ kadācitsamuccityāpi nāḍyādīnāṃ sthānatvamiti na samuccayaśrutivirodha iti pūrvapakṣārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:529: yadā nāḍyaḥ suṣuptisthānaṃ tadā purītatsthānaṃ na bhavatīti śrutasthānatvasya pakṣe bādhaḥ syāt,
GSP33brsgor3u:536: tathehāpi nāḍīpurītatorjīvasya saṃcāradvārā brahmaṇyeva suptiriti samuccaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:537: nāḍīnāṃ prāṇasya ca ekena vākyenopādānānmithaḥ samuccaya ityāha-ekavākyeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:538: ādhāratvamātraṃ saptamyartho na nirapekṣatvamato na samuccayasya saptamyā bādha ityāha-na caivamapīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:540: atra nāḍīśrutau nāḍīṣu bhoktuḥ suptirna vivakṣitā raśmisaṃbandhanāḍīrūpamārgastutyarthatvādityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:544: 'tāsu tadā bhavatyathāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'iti śruteḥ samuccaya āśrito bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:546: ākāśe brahmaṇi śeta ityupakramya tābhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītamiti śeta ityuktaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:547: tathāca nāḍīdvārā purītataṃ gatvā brahmaṇi śeta iti samuccayaḥ siddha ityāha-tathā nāḍīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:548: satā saṃpanno bhavati prājñena saṃpariṣvakta iti satprājñayoḥ śruteḥ pañca suptisthānānītyata āha-satprājñayoriti /
GSP33brsgor3u:550: nāḍyādīnāṃ tu brahmanirapekṣatayā suṣuptajīvādhāratvāsāmarthyānna vikalpa ityāha-apica nāḍya iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:554: nanu brahmāpi jīvasya na mukhyaṃ sthānaṃ abhedādityata āha-brahmādhāratvamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:555: jīvasya brahmaṇyabhedenāvasthānaṃ nāḍīpurītatostu līnopādherjīvasya sthitireva na saṃbhavatītyekārthasāmarthyābhāvānna vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:556: suṣuptau jīvasya bhedakopādhilayāccautsargikabrahmābhedasya vikalpo na yukta ityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:557: kiñca nāḍyādīnāmanyatamasthāne kvacitsuptivādināpi suṣuptaṃ na viśiṣyata iti vaktavyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:558: tacca vaktuṃ na śakyata ityāha-apica sthāneti /
GSP33brsgor3u:560: nāḍīpūritadratasya tu jīvasya bhedāvasthatvādbhedāvijñāne karaṇaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:565: upādhisaṃbhinnasyaiva nāḍyādau svāpe katipayasaṃnikṛṣṭārthajñānaprasaṅgāt suṣuptivyāghātaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:566: upādhilaye tvanyatra jīvasya sthityayogādbrahmaṇyeva svāpa āstheya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:567: evaṃ vikalpaṃ nirasya nāḍīpurītatorbrahmaṇā saha tulyavatsamuccayamaphalatvena dūṣayan guṇapradhānatvena samuccayamupasaṃharati-naca vayamityādinā //7//
GSP33brsgor3u:572: kiñca brahmaṇaḥ sakāśājjīvasyotthānaśruterbrahmaiva suṣuptisthānamityāha-sūtrakāraḥ-ataḥ prabodha iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:574: tasmādupādhilaye jīvasya brahmābhedādaupādhika eva bheda iti vivekadvākyārthābhedasiddhiriti sthitam //8//
GSP33brsgor3u:580: suṣuptau upādhināśāt karmānusmṛtyāderdarśanācca saṃśaye satyasmādbrahmaṇo jīvasyotthānaśruterbrahmaiva suṣuptisthānamityuktamayuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:581: suptādanyasyāpyutthānasaṃbhavena suṣuptasya nāḍyādisthānatvasaṃbhavādityākṣepasaṃgatyā niyamakābhāvādaniyama iti pūrvapakṣamāha-tasyāḥ punarityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:583: siddhānte tu ajñātabrahmātmanā sthitasyājñānabalena punastasyaivotthānāvaśyaṃbhāvādajñānanāśāya jñānāpekṣeti phalam /
GSP33brsgor3u:586_0: jñānaṃ vinā buddhyādyupādheratyantanāśābhāvādyayā buddhyopahito jīvaḥ suṣuptau kāraṇātmanā
GSP33brsgor3u:586_1: sthitastasyaiva nānākarmānubhavasaṃskāravatyopahita uttiṣṭhatīti siddhāntayati-sa eva tvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:591: pratiniyataṃ gamanaṃ yathā bhavati tathā pratiyonyāgacchati jāgaraṇāyeti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:593: iha pūrvaprabodhe ye bhavanti ta eva tadottaraprabodhe bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:595: sa evottiṣṭhatīti niścīyate ityarthaḥ atraivotsūtraṃ yuktyantaramāha-apicetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:598: asmadādyaśakyamapi vivecanaṃ prāṇyadṛṣṭāpekṣa īśvaraḥ karotīti matvā dṛṣṭāntamāha-dṛśyate ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:600: abhede sa vānyo vottiṣṭhati iti cintānavakāśa ityāśaṅkya buddhibhedena jīvabhedāccintetyāha-evaṃ satīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:601: suṣuptau buddhināśena pratyahaṃ buddhyupādhibhedādekajīvasya vyavahāro na syādityata āha-sa evāyamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:610: pūrvapakṣe prasiddhāvasthātaḥ pṛthagātmano mūrcchāto vivekārthaṃ yatnāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:611: siddhānte pṛthagyatnadhrauvyamiti bhedaḥ pariśeṣaṃ darśayan siddhāntayati-na tāvadityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:613: aindriyakamarthajñānaṃ dehadhāraṇaṃ ca tasyāsti na mugdhasyeti vaiṣamyoktyā dūṣayati-netyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:620: uktasārūpyavairūpyābhyāmardhasaṃpattiḥ sarvaiḥ suṣuptidharmairasaṃpanno mugdhaḥ suṣupto na bhavati,
GSP33brsgor3u:621: sarvairmaraṇāvasthādharmairasaṃpattermṛto 'pi na kintu avasthāntaraṃ gata iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:622: atra sūtre jīvasya brahmaṇārdhasaṃpattirukteti bhrāntaḥ śaṅkate-kathamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:624: upādhyabhāvaśca mugdhasyāpi mama iti yatastasmāt kṛtsnasaṃpattirevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:627: mugdhatvaṃ hi suṣuptasyārdhena niḥsaṃjñatvādidharmeṇa sāmyena saṃpannaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brsgor3u:637: na sthānato 'pi parasyobhayaliṅgaṃ sarvatra hi | BBs_3,2.11 |
GSP33brsgor3u:638: sarvābhiravasthābhiraliptastvamartha iti nirūpayitukāmaḥ prathamaṃ tasya nirviśeṣatvamāha-na sthānato 'pi parasyobhyaliṅgaṃ sarvatra hi /
GSP33brsgor3u:640: nirviśeṣatvaṃsav iśeṣatvaṃ cetyubhayaṃ liṅgyate jñāpyate yābhistā ubhayaliṅgaḥ śrutayaḥ saṃśayabījatvena santītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:641: yathā viruddhasuṣuptimaraṇobhayarūpaṃ mugdhatvaṃ tathā śrutiprāmāṇyādubhayarūpaṃ brahma dhyeyamiti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:644: uta svato nirguṇasya sarvagandhatvādiviśeṣa upādhitaḥ satyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:649: upādheḥ satyatve 'pi tatkṛtaṃ mithyeti dṛṣṭaṃ brahmaṇi tūpādhīnāṃ mithyātvāttatkṛto viśeṣo mithyeti kimu vācyamityāha-upādhīnāmiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:656: na bhedād iti cen na pratyekamatadvacanāt | BBs_3,2.12 |
GSP33brsgor3u:658: nirviśeṣatvaśrutāvapi viśeṣasyāpi śruterubhayarūpatvaṃ syāditi śaṅkāṃ vyācaṣṭe-athāpi syāditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:661: kimupādhigata eva rūpabhedo brahmaṇyupacaryate dhyānārthamutopādhiyogātsatyaviruddharūpavattayā brahmaṇo bhedo bhavatīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:668: bhoktā jīvo bhogyaṃ śabdādi tayoḥ preritāramīśvaraṃ ca matvā vicārya me mama proktaṃ tatsarvaṃ trividhaṃ brahmaiveti jānīyādityarthaḥ //13//
GSP33brsgor3u:673: dvividhaśrutiṣu satīṣu nirviśeṣatve kiṃ niyāmakamiti śaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brsgor3u:674: tatparātaparavirodhe tatparaṃ balavaditi nyāyo niyāmaka ityāha-arūpavadeveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:686: saṃprati satyaṃ nirviśeṣatvaṃ mithyā saviśeṣatvamityucyata ityubhayarūpatvāṅgīkāre 'pi na pūrvāparavirodha ityāha-neti brūma iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:687: dvaitasya mithyātve jñānena bādhādupāsanādivyavahāro na syādityāśaṅkya bādhātprāgeva sa ityāha-satyamiti //15//
GSP33brsgor3u:692: yataḥ śrutiścinmātramāhātaśca viśeṣo mithyeti sūtrārthamāha-āha ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:698: kiñca śrutismṛtyoḥ paraniṣedhena brahmopadeśānniṣprapañcaṃ brahmetyāha-darśayati ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:699: atha dvaitoktyanantaraṃ jñānahetutvānneti neti upadeśaḥ kriyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:700: adhi anyat punaḥ punaradhīhi bho iti nirbandhakāriṇaṃ taṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ ca praśne tūṣṇībhāvaṃ tyaktvovāca /
GSP33brsgor3u:702: atastasya tūṣṇīṃbhāva evottaramiti sautraśca atośabdastathārthakaḥ ādimatkāryaṃ tanna bhavatītyanādimat /
GSP33brsgor3u:705: sarvabhūtaguṇairdivyagandhādibhiryuktaṃ māṃ mūrtimantaṃ paśyasīti yatsā māyā,
GSP33brsgor3u:706: ata eva sadvaito bhagavāniti māṃ draṣṭuṃ nārhasi vastuto dvaitātītatvādityarthaḥ //17//
GSP33brsgor3u:711: kiñca yathā jalādyupādhikalpitaḥ sūryacandrāderbhedacalanādirdharma evamātmana iti dṛṣṭāntaśruteśca nirviśeṣaṃ tattvamityāha-ata eva copameti /
GSP33brsgor3u:713_0: yathāyaṃ jyotirmayo vivasvānsvata eko 'pi ghaṭabhedena bhinnāḥ apo 'nugacchan bahudhā
GSP33brsgor3u:713_1: kriyate evamajo 'yamātmā devaḥ svaprakāśa eko 'pyupādhinā māyayā kṣetreṣvanugacchan
GSP33brsgor3u:719: ātmano nīrūpatvāddūrasthopādhyabhāvācca māyayā buddhyādiṣu pratibimbabhedo na yukta ityarthaḥ //19//
GSP33brsgor3u:725: dṛṣṭāntasāmye 'pi nīrūpātmanaḥ pratibimbaṃ svabuddhyā kathaṃ kalpyata ityata āha-na cedamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:730: ātmā pratibimbaśūnyaḥ, nīrūpadravyatvāt, vāyuvadityanumāne ākāśe vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:738: dvipadaḥ puro manuṣyādidehāṃścakre catuṣpadaḥ puraḥ paśūnkṛtvā puraścakṣurādyabhivyakteḥ purastāt sa īśvaraḥ pakṣī liṅgaśarīrī bhūtvā pura uktāni śarīrāṇyāviśat,
GSP33brsgor3u:739: sa ca praviṣṭo 'pi puruṣaḥ pūrṇa evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:741: evaṃ pratibimbabhāvena bhedādeḥ kalpitatvāt nirviśeṣaṃ brahmeti svamatamupasaṃharati-tasmāditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:744: tatra brahmaṇo niṣprapañcatve sthite kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ brahmeti saṃdehe prakāśavaccetyādidvitīyamadhikaraṇaṃ pravṛttaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:745: na sadrūpameva brahma kintu prakāśavacca cidrūpaṃ ca /
GSP33brsgor3u:747: satyaṃ jñānaṃ sadeva somyetyubhayaśruterdvirūpe brahmaṇyarthavattvāditi pūrvapakṣe siddhāntaḥ-āha ca tanmātram /
GSP33brsgor3u:751: uta bodharūpatvanirāsa āhosvitsattānirāsa iti vikalpya sarvathāpyānarthakyaṃ prapañcayannādye gatārthatāmāha-yadi tāvaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:758: evaṃ siddhāntaṃ phalābhāvena dūṣayitvā pūrvapakṣaṃ dūṣayati-nāpīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:777: evaṃ sarve śabdā anākārabrahmaparā eveti tanmatamanūdya dūṣayati-yadapītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:780: asya jīvabhāvaṃ prāptasyeśvarasya daśa harayo viṣayā haraṇāddaśendriyāṇi prāṇibhedāpekṣayā śatāni sahasrāṇi ca teṣāmīśvarādbhedamāśaṅkyāha-ayamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:783: manomayādiśabdānāṃ mukhyavṛttyā guṇaparatvasaṃbhave niṣedhalakṣaṇāpi na yuktetyāha-śrutyā ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:784: kiṃ cākārānākāraśrutidvaividhye sati brahmanākāramevetyatra kiṃ vinigamakamiti śaṅkotthānādasthūlādiśrutīnāṃ nirākāratātparyaṃ niyāmakamiti kathanārthamidaṃ sūtramarthavadbhavati /
GSP33brsgor3u:785: sarvaśrutīnāṃ niṣedhārthatve tu śaṅkānutthānānniyāmakasūtraṃ vyarthaṃ syādityāha-sarveṣāṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:786: nanūpāsanār'thakavākyānāṃ svārthe phalābhāvāt saphalaniṣedhavākyaśeṣatvamityāśaṅkya phalasya śrutatvānnānyaśeṣatetyāha-phalamapīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:793: nanu prapañcavilaye brahmalayaḥ syādabhedādityata āha-brahmasvabhāvo hi prapañca iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:794: kāraṇaṃ hi kāryasya svarūpamataḥ kāryanāśe 'pi kāraṇasya na layaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:796: prapañcasya satyasya kalpitasya vā laye vidhiriti vikalpyādyaṃ dūṣayati-tatra yadi tāvaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:797: satyasya jñānādadhvasteḥ musalādinā ca kṛtsnadvaitadhvaṃsāyogāt nabhograsanavidhivadaśakyaviṣayo 'yaṃ vidhiḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:801: kiñca brahmajñānādau vidhiḥ kiṃ brahmaṇyajñāte jñāte vā /
GSP33brsgor3u:804: upadeśādeva jñāte brahmaṇi sākṣātkāradvaitabādhayoḥ siddhervidhivaiyarthyaṃ siddhasya vidhinā kartumayogādityāha-neti /
GSP33brsgor3u:809: tarhi jñāne vidhipratyayānāṃ kā gatirityata āha-draṣṭavyādiśabdā iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:810: nanu śrutaṃ jñānaṃ tyaktvā tatsādhanavyāpāravidhiḥ kimiti kalpyata ityāśaṅkya jñānasya puruṣakṛtyasādhyatvādityāha-jñeyābhimukhasyāpīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:811: kiñca jñānavidhivādinā jñeyaṃ brahmāvaśyaṃ vedāntairjñāpanīyaṃ viṣayānavabodhe vidhibodhāyogāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:818: kṛtiṃ vinaiva cedbhrāntirevāto mānaṃ vinā vidhito jñānāsiddhermānavastutantre jñāne vidhirmṛṣetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:820: brahmātmaikyeniyoge ca vedāntavākyasya prāmāṇyamāśaṅkyārthabhedādvākyabhedo viruddhārthatvādaprāmāṇyaṃ ceti dūṣayati-athetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:821: kiñca śrutaṃ brahma na śruto vidhirvedānteṣu tatkalpane ca karmajanyatvānmokṣasyānityatvasātiśayatvādiprasaṅga ityāha-niyogaparatāyāṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:824: bhinnakriyāvāciśabdaḥ śabdāntaraṃ yathā yajati dadātīti tathehāpi vedopāsīteti śabdabhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:830: naca nirguṇavidyāniyoga eka eva saguṇavidyānaṅgīkārāditi vācyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:835: nirguṇavākyānāṃ tu paramārthālambanatvamityasmadukta eva vibhāgaḥ sādhīyānityupasaṃharati-tasmāditi //21//
GSP33brsgor3u:839: prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūyaḥ | BBs_3,2.22 |
GSP33brsgor3u:840: brahmaṇo nirviśeṣacinmātratvamuktvā sarvaniṣedhāvadhitvena sadrūpatvamāha-prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūya iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:841_1: sāraḥ 'karaṇātmā hiraṇyagarbho ya eṣa etasmin sūryamaṇḍale puruṣo yaścāyaṃ dakṣiṇe
GSP33brsgor3u:844: tatra mahārajanaṃ haridrā tayā liptaṃ vastraṃ māhārajanaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:846: kecittu śrutimupalakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā sūkṣmapañcabhūtānyamūrtāni pañcīkṛtāni mūrtāni tataścāmūrtarasatvoktyā karaṇānāṃ pāñcabhautikatvasiddhiriti vyācakṣate /
GSP33brsgor3u:848: ata uktāropasya niṣedhārthatvānneti netīti niṣedhenopadeśaḥ kriyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:856: niradhiṣṭhānaniṣedhādarśanātsarvaniṣedho na yukta ityarucyā prapañce brahmaniṣedha ityāha-athaveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:857: ekabrahmaṇa eva niṣedhe nakāradvayasya paunaruktyāmityata āha-abhyāsastviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:861: adhiṣṭhānānavaśeṣe tatpramārūpahetvabhāvāt niṣedhavākyārthaḥ pramā na syāt 'idamatra nāsti'iti loke niṣedhasya sādhiṣṭhānasyaiva pramitidarśanādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:864: adhiṣṭhānasattvaṃ vinā bhrāntiniṣedhayorayogācchūnyavādo na yukta ityuktvā pūrvavādinaḥ pakṣāntaraṃ dūṣayati-nāpīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:865: dehātmābhimānavallaukikamānaprāptadvaitasya niṣedho yukto na vedāntapramitabrahmaṇa iti bhāvaḥ yaduktaṃ vāṅmanasātītvāt niṣedhārhaṃ brahma iti tatrāha-vāṅmanaseti /
GSP33brsgor3u:866: brahmaṇo vāgādyatītatvaṃ niṣedhārthaṃ na cet kimarthaṃ taduktirityata āha-pratipādaneti /
GSP33brsgor3u:868: 'dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe'iti rūpadvayasyaiva prādhānyena prakṛtatvānnetīti niṣedha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:869: nanu 'ādityamaṇḍale puruṣa'iti brahmāpyatra prādhānyenoktamityāśaṅkya puruṣo liṅgātmā amūrtarasatvaśrutyā bhūtajanitatvabhānāt svapnarūpatvaśruteścetyāha-tajjanitameveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:870: rūparūpiṇorabheda uktaḥ nanu vāsanāmayaṃ rūpameva kimityupamīyate prasiddharūpameva kiṃ na syādityata āha-amūrtarasasyeti /
GSP33brsgor3u:873: na cārthataḥ pradhānyadbrahmaṇo niṣedhaḥ rājño bhṛtyo nāstītyatra rājaniṣedhaprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:874: kiñcaitra brahmaṇaḥ pratipādyatvāt na niṣedha ityāha-prapañcite ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:875: nanu brahmaṇi niṣiddhasyāpyanyatra sthitisaṃbhavāt kathaṃ kalpitatvamityata āha-tadāspadamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:877: yattu dvaitaniṣedhe pratyakṣādivirodha iti, tatrāha-yuktaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:878: sthāpitaṃ hi ārambhaṇādhikaraṇe pratyakṣādervyāvahārikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na tatvāvedakamiti,
GSP33brsgor3u:883: yaccoktaṃ niṣedhābhyāṃ rūpaṃ rūpi brahma ca niṣidhyata iti, tatrāha-dvau caitāviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:884: uddeśyavidheyārthānāṃ saṃkhyāsāmye yathākramaṃ saṃbandha iti nyāyaḥ 'yathāsaṅkhyamanudeśaḥ samānām'iti pāṇinisūtrasiddhastenātra rūpadvayoddeśena niṣedhadvayavidhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:886: mūrtaṃ nāmūrtaṃ netyevaṃ viśiṣyaniṣedhe jijñāsā na śāmyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:888: pratiṣedhānupapattyā brahmāstītyavagataṃ bhūyaḥ punaḥ paramastīti śrutiḥ sākṣādapi bravītītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:903: tarhi kadā grāhyamiti śaṅkottaraṃ sūtraṃ vyākhyāti-api cainamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:905: indriyairna gṛhyate api tu saṃrādhanena śāstrasaṃskṛtamanasetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:906: bhaktidhyānābhyāṃ pratyagātmanaścitte prakarṣeṇa nidhānaṃ sthāpanaṃ praṇidhānaṃ /
GSP33brsgor3u:911: sa hi teṣāṃ nāśo yadasadarthagrāhitayā sarjanaṃ tasmātteṣāṃ tayā sṛṣṭatvāt,
GSP33brsgor3u:913: kaścittu dhīro dhīmānāvṛttacakṣurniruddhendriyaḥ śuddhe cetasi pratyagātmanaṃ śāstreṇa paśyati mokṣārthītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:914: tataḥ karmaṇā viśuddhacitto jñānākhyasattvotkarṣeṇa saṃdhyāyaṃstaṃ niṣkalaṃ paśyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:921: yathā prakāśādaya upādhiṣu bhidyante na svataḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:922: evaṃ prakāśaścidātmāpi dhyānādikarmaṇyupādho bhidyate svatastasyāvaiśeṣyamekarasatvameva tattvamasītyabhyāsāditi sūtrayojanā //25//
GSP33brsgor3u:927: jīvasya brahmātmatvaphalaśrutirūpaliṅgādapi bheda aupādhika evetyāha sūtrakāraḥ-ato 'nanteneti //26//
GSP33brsgor3u:937: yadvā sūryaprakāśayorekatejastvadharmāvacchedena bhedābhedavajjīvaparayorapi ekenaivātmatvadharmeṇa bhedābhedau śrutibalātsvīkāryāviti sūtradvayārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:947: dharmabhedanaikadharmeṇa vā bhedābhedasvīkāre bhedasya satyatvādabhedavadanivṛttiḥ syāt ekatraiva bhedābhedasvīkāre loke virodhakathoccheda ityapi draṣṭavyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:948: tasmāt niṣprapañcaṃ cidekarasaṃ brahma tatpadalakṣyamastīti siddham //29 // //30//
GSP33brsgor3u:953: yaduktaṃ neti netītyādiśrutibhiḥ brahmātiriktaṃ vastu niṣidhyata iti, tadayuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:955: yadyapi dyubhvādyadhikaraṇe setuśabdo vidhārakatvena gauṇo vyākhyātastathāpyunmānādiśrutīnāṃ gatimajānato 'yaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ,
GSP33brsgor3u:957: sadvayaṃ brahmeti phalaṃ siddhānte tūktādvitīyatatpadalakṣyasiddhiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:960: jāṅgalaṃ vātabhūyiṣṭhamiti vaidyokteḥ vātapracuro deśo jāṅgalaṃ, iha tu deśamātraṃ grāhyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:964: cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāṅmana ityāyatanavānnāma pāda iti catuṣpādbrahmeti pādānāmardhāni aṣṭau śaphā asyetyaṣṭāśaphaṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:965: pādeṣu caturṣu pratyekaṃ catasraḥ kalā iti ṣoḍaśakalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:966: ṣoḍaśapaṇaparimitaṃ tāmraṃ kārṣāpaṇasaṃjñaṃ bhavati tadvatsadvayaṃ brahma, parimitatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:979: nādyaḥ mānābhāvāt kāryasya brahmananyatvanirguṇayāccetyuktvā na dvitīyaḥ prāgutpatteradvayatvāvadhāraṇādityāha-naca brahmavyatiriktamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:982: kiṃ setuśrutyā parasiddhirarthādvā, nādya ityuktvā dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate-tatra parasminniti /
GSP33brsgor3u:985: vidhārakatvaṃ tu kalpitadvitīyāpekṣayāpi yujyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:992: vākprāṇacakṣuḥśrotrāṇi manasaḥ pādā agnivāyvādityadiśa ākāśasya pādā dhyānārthaṃ kalpitāstadvadbrahmaṇa unmānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:994: pādakalpanāṃ vināpi vyavahāraḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:995: kārṣāpaṇasya vyavahārāya pādakalpanāvat mandadhiyāṃ dhyānavyavahārāya brahmaṇa unmānakalpanetyarthaḥ //33//
GSP33brsgor3u:1001: sthānamupādhibuddhyādiḥ ekasyaivopādhinā bhinnasyopādhiśāntau satyāṃ saṃbandha upacaryate /
GSP33brsgor3u:1002: yathā saurālokāderaṅgulyādyupādhinā bhinnasyopādhiviyoge mahālokādyātmanā saṃbandhopacārastadvat tathāditya cakṣuṣoḥ sthānayorbhedāddhiraṇmayapuruṣabhedakalpanetyarthaḥ //34//
GSP33brsgor3u:1007: mukhyāveva saṃbandhabhedau kiṃ na syātamityatra sūtram-upapatteśceti //35//
GSP33brsgor3u:1012: svarūpeṇa brahmaṇā jīvasya saṃbandho bhedanivṛttirūpo yujyate na mukhyaḥ saṃyogādiḥ vastudvayāsattvāt tathā bhedo 'pi na svata ekatvaśruterityarthaḥ //36//
GSP33brsgor3u:1017: nanu dvitīyābhāve sarvagatatvaśrutivirodha ityata āha-anena sarvagatatvamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1018_2: iti bhāvaḥ adhiṣṭhānenādhyastaṃ jagadvyāptamadhyastatvāt rajjvā vyāptasarpavat, iti nyāyaḥ //37 //
GSP33brsgor3u:1024: nirviśeṣatvādanyaḥ svabhāvaḥ phalahetutvākhyaḥ iṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ devādīnāṃ,
GSP33brsgor3u:1027: saṃsāro janmamṛtipravāhaḥ gocaraḥ āśrayo yasya tatsaṃsāragocaram /
GSP33brsgor3u:1029: atra pūrvapakṣe phaladāturīśvarasya tatpadavācyasyāsiddherlakṣyāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1031_0: yadyapi sarvagatatvavatphaladātṛtvaṃ vyavahāradaśāyāṃ sidhyati yathāpi karmaṇa eva
GSP33brsgor3u:1033: yāgādikriyākhyaṃ karma tāvat kṣaṇikaṃ tatkiṃ svanāśāt phalaṃ janayatyuta phalamutpādya naśyati,
GSP33brsgor3u:1039: apūrvaṃ kiṃ svatantrameva phaladānāya pravartate, cetanādhiṣṭhitaṃ vā, nādya ityāha-tadapīti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1053: karmaṇo 'pūrvasya vā jaḍatvenopakaraṇamātratvātsvatantra īśvara eva phaladāteti siddhānto darśitaḥ //39//
GSP33brsgor3u:1060: tasya liṅarthasya preraṇātmano yāgo viṣayastadbhāvāvagamādyāgaḥ svargasādhanamiti gamyate /
GSP33brsgor3u:1062: apūrvadvārā karmaṇaḥ phalamupapadyata ityuktvā siddhāntaṃ dūṣayati-īśvarastviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:1063: īśvaraḥ kiṃ karmānapekṣaḥ phalaṃ dadāti tatsāpekṣo vā, ādya āha-avicitrasyetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:1064: dvitīye saṃveṣṭanasaṃskāramātrātkaṭādau veṣṭanavatkarmāpūrvādeva phalasiddheḥ kimīśvareṇeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1065: atra vayaṃ vadāmaḥ-candanakaṇḍakādidṛṣṭasaṃpattyaiva sukhādisaṃbhave kṛtaṃ dharmādharmābhyāmiti śrutismṛtibalāttadapekṣāyāmīśvareṇa kimaparāddham /
GSP33brsgor3u:1074: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brsgor3u:1087: iha tatphalaṃ vākyārthajñānamānandādayaḥ pradhānasyeti sūtreṇāpunaruktāpekṣitatatpadadvācyārthopasaṃhāreṇa nirdhāryata iti phalaphalibhāvaḥ saṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1088: saguṇavākyārthavidyācintā tu tadvidyānāṃ cittaikāgryadvārā nirguṇajñānasādhanatvātkriyata iti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor3u:1091: vedyabhede vidyābhedacintā syāt brahmaṇastu vedyasyaikyānna cintāvasara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:1095: pūrvapakṣe jñānabhedaśaṅkānupapattimuktvā codanādyabhedājjñānābheda iti siddhānto 'pyayukta ityāha-nāpyasyeti /

GSP33brsgor3u:2921: surāpānenāpi jīvanamāśaṅkya kadāpi tanna kāryamityāha-tathā madyaṃ nityaṃ brahmaṇa iti /

GSP33brsgor3u:2941: tasyā anityatvādyāvajjīvādividhinā tu nityatvaṃ ceti viruddhadharmadvayāpātādvividiṣāśruteḥ stutitvamiti phalaṃ pūrvapakṣe /
GSP33brsgor3u:2947: saha militvā śuddhidvārā vidyāṃ kurvantīti sahakārīṇi karmāṇi /
GSP33brsgor3u:2951: ato vihitāni karmāṇi avihitāyā na sahakāryaṅgāni mokṣasyāsādhyatvācca na karmāṇāṃ sahakāritvasaṃbhava ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:2953: kāmanāyā anityatve 'pi karmaṇāṃ nānityatvaṃ nityavidhinā prayogasya nityatvāt /

GSP33brsgor3u:2965: siddhakarmasu saṃskāratvaprasiddhirapi śuddhākhyasaṃskāradvārā jñānārthakakarmābhede liṅgamityāha-yasyaita iti //34//
GSP33brsgor3u:2977: anāśramiṇāṃ japādikarmasattvānninditatvācca saṃśaye sati āśramakarmaṇāmeva vidyāhetutvaśruteranāśramasya ninditatvāccānadhikāra iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /

GSP33brsgor3u:2987: nanvanāśramiṇāṃ karma bhavatu vidyāhetustathāpi teṣāṃ na śravaṇādāvadhikāraḥ saṃnyāsābhāvādityata āha-dṛṣṭārthā ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:2989: saṃnyāso 'pi kadācitkṛto jñāna upakaroti śravaṇaṃ pratyanaṅgatvāditi bhāvaḥ //38//

GSP33brsgor3u:3004: siddhānte tu bhraṣṭasya karma na heturiti phalam /

GSP33brsgor3u:3022: atra kṛtaprāyaścittasya karma jñānaheturna bhavatīti phalaṃ siddhānte tu bhavatītidaḥ /

GSP33brsgor3u:3024_2: nirṇītaṃ prāyaścittamādhikārikaṃ tadupakurvāṇasyaiva na naiṣṭhikasyeti prāpte siddhāntayati //41 //
GSP33brsgor3u:3028: upapūrvam api tv eke bhāvamaśanavat tad uktam | BBs_3,4.42 |
GSP33brsgor3u:3031: 'prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmi'iti darśanābhāvasmṛteḥ prāyaścittābhāvāparatvaṃ kalpayitvā tanmūlaśrutikalpanātprāgeva kḷptasādhāraṇaśrutyā prāyaścittasadbhāvasiddheḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3033: prāyaścittasya bhāvābhāvasiddhyoḥ samatve 'pi bhāvaprasiddhiḥ śrutimūlatvādādartavyetyatra saṃmatimāha-taduktamiti /

GSP33brsgor3u:3090_0: yasmātpūrve brāhmaṇā ātmānaṃ viditvā saṃnyasya bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti tasmādadyatano
GSP33brsgor3u:3090_1: 'pi brāhmaṇa āpātajñānarūpapaṇḍāvānpaṇḍitastasya kṛtyaṃ pāṇḍityaṃ śravaṇaṃ tannirvidya

GSP33brsgor3u:3090_5: labdhvā atha jñānasāmagrīpauṣkalyānantaraṃ brahmāhamiti sākṣātkāravān brāhmaṇo bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3091: maunaśabdasya siddharūpe pārivrājye anuṣṭheye ca dhyāne prayogātsaṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3092: yathā taṃ ha baka ityādivākyaśeṣādudgīthādyupāsanasyārtvijyatvanirṇayastadvadatha brāhmaṇa iti vidhihīnavākyaśeṣānmaunasyāpyavidheyatvaniścaya iti pūrvapakṣamāha-na vidhīyata iti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3094: yadi maunaṃ pārivrājyaṃ tadā vākyāntaraprāptamanūdyate bālyavidhipraśaṃsārtham /
GSP33brsgor3u:3100: kiñcāmaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyeti śravaṇamananavadanuṣṭheyatvoktermaunasya vidheyatetyāha-nirvedanīyatveti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3105: sūkṣmārthasākṣātkārasādhanatvena dhyānādeḥ ṣaḍjādau lokataḥ prāptiṃ śaṅkitvā niyamavidhimāha-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:3106: nanu brahmavidyāpare vākye kathaṃ jñānāṅgamiti cetsaphalakratuparavākye 'ṅgavidhivadityāha-vidhyādivaditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:3108: tatra pradhānaḥ kraturvidhyādirata evāṅgaṃ vidhyanta ityucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3115: samāvartanānantaraṃ kuṭumbe sthito brahmalokaṃ prāpnoti naca punarāvartata ityupasaṃhārātsaṃnyāso nāstīti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3131: tatra bālye viṣaye taddhitasya bhāvārthatvāsaṃbhavātkarmārthatvaṃ gṛhītvā tiṣṭhanmūtratvādikarmaṇo 'prarūḍhendriyatvādirūpabhāvaśuddheśca bālakarmatvāviśeṣātsaṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3132: pūrvapakṣe vidyāṅgatvena tiṣṭhanmūtratvāderapyanuṣṭhānaṃ siddhānte bhāvaśuddhereveti phalam /
GSP33brsgor3u:3133: pūrvatra maunaśabdasya jñānātiśaye dhyāne prasiddhatvāt dhyānaṃ vidheyamityuktam,
GSP33brsgor3u:3136: yathopapādaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ mūtrādi yasya tadbhāvastattvaṃ bālyavidhibalātpātityaśāstramanyaviṣayamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3138: na sa tatpadamāpnoti saṃsāraṃ cādhigacchati'ityādi śaucabhikṣādiniyamavidhiśāstrāviruddhasya bhāvaśuddhākhyabālyasya vidhisaṃbhavānna yatheṣṭaceṣṭāvidhiriti siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3145: aihikamapi saṃnyāsādibālyāntaṃ sādhanajātamuktvā tatsādhyavidyājanma vicāryata iti saṃgatiṃ vadan sādhanasya dvidhā phalasaṃbhavātsaṃśayamāha-sarvetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor3u:3148: śuddhidvārā yajñādibhiḥ śravaṇādiṣu sākṣādvidyāhetuṣu ghaṭiteṣu vidyāvilambo na yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3149: dṛśyate ca vilambaḥ ataḥ śravaṇādervidyāhetutvamasiddhamiti pūrvapakṣe phalam /
GSP33brsgor3u:3150: pratibandhakavaśādvilambe 'pi hetutvasiddhiriti siddhānte phalaṃ matvā citrādivadaniyataphalaṃ śravaṇādikamiti siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3151: nanu prārabdhakarmaviśeṣeṇa śravaṇādiphalapratibandhaḥ kimiti kriyate śravaṇādinaiva karmavipākapratibandhaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-upasthitavipākatvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3153: tena śravaṇādikameva kimiti na vipacyante, tatrāha-yāni ceti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3157: tathāpi karmaṇaiva śravaṇādipratibandho na vaiparītyamityatra ko hetustamāha-sādhaneti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3168: asati prārabdhakarmapratibandhe śravaṇādinehaiva vidyodayaḥ yajñādibhiḥ saṃcitapāpapratibandhasya nirastatvāt /
GSP33brsgor3u:3169_0: sati tu bhogena tannirāsādamutreti vidyāyā aihikāmuṣmikatvaviśeṣaniyama uktastadvatphale
GSP33brsgor3u:3171: tasyāṃ vidyāvadviśeṣaniyamo 'sti na veti phalasyobhayathāsaṃbhavātsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-yatheti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3172: muktiḥ saviśeṣā, phalatvādvidyāvadataḥ karmasādhyā muktiriti phalam /
GSP33brsgor3u:3174: kiñca śravaṇāditāratamyādvidyāyāṃ kañcidatiśayamaṅgīkṛtya vidyālabhyamuktau nātiśaya ityāha-apica vidyāsādhanamiti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3177: vidyayābhivyaktatvena brahmānanda eva mukhyaphalamabhivyaktiravidyānivṛttirānandasvarūpasphūrtipratibandhakābhāvatayā vidyayā sādhyate sā cānirvācyeti na dvaitāpattiḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3187: kathaṃ tarhi pūrvādhikaraṇe vidyāyā viśeṣa uktaḥ, tatrāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brsgor3u:3188: satyāmapi sāmagryāṃ jñāne vilamba ukto na tāratamyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3189: tarhi satyapi jñāne muktau vilambaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-natviti /
GSP33brsgor3u:3190: vāyvādipratibandhāddipotpattivilambe 'pyutpanne tamonivṛttivilambādarśanātsati jñāne nājñānanivṛttau vilamba iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor3u:3191: kiñca karmaṇāmupāsanānāṃ ca guṇabhedena tāratamyātphalatāratamyaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsgor3u:3196: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatkṛtau śārīrakavyākhyāyā bhāṣyaratnaprabhāṭīkāyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
